thread.section_title: United Capital Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of United Capital Source | unitedcapitalsource.com
thread.title: Jason Lenzinger
thread.title_full: United Capital Source reviewed by Jason Lenzinger

author: Jason Lenzinger
title: Jason Lenzinger
text:
George Rusinak is a straight shooter and great to work with. He was able to get us the financing we needed in less time than I would have expected it to take just to fill out the paper work involved with most financing. He stayed in contact throughout the process and everything he told us was exactly what the final product delivered. Can't recommend him enough!
Thank you,
Jason L.
